topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e5371763687228ff3e1000#post_54e5371763687228ff3e1000
It's pretty hard to understand at first.
So, the metals are like your coins, the scraps are 0.11, the reclaimed 0.33, and the Refined 1.00.
The Crone Dome, which is uncraftable, is 1.33 ref, and I have enough to buy one.

The keys are like dollars, and you can buy them with metals, though at the moment, they cost, like what, 13 refs? Keys are used to buy rare items.

And then you got the buds, what I would call, liiiike a hundred dollar. As of now, a single bud cost 12 keys, so I never could get one.

Every trades are done through Steam. and most trades are found on certain websites, such as TF2outpost.

You also have Steam BOTS, which are fast ways to buy/sell items, though I haven't been finding much. Seeing as you have some games that would require buying, I think you'll be fine with them.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e53af463687206df410b00#post_54e53af463687206df410b00
Well, no. The metals HAVE to be crafted. You can use weapons you don't want to be crafted into scrap, though you need 2. The scrap metal can then be combined into reclaimed metals, and reclaimed metals into refined metal.
You can't craft Refined Metals into Key, you have to buy them using the metal, and the key for the bud is the same for the ref for the keys.
